Installation + Setup¶

DIAS requires no further installation other than the required downloads (Download).

Deployments¶

DIAS comes with pre-configured deployments. As there are a number of components required to operate a DIAS network (e.g Protopeer Overview), there are various configuration files for each component. For convenience, these are all grouped into components.

In the next section, when you launch DIAS (Launching DIAS), you will need to choose a deployment.

To get started, you should choose deployments/localhost, but you may add or modify deployments.
